sentences.sContent: After boating, they go to have lunch nearby.
sentences.sContent_eng: After boating, they go to have lunch nearby.
sentences.sCn: 划过船以后，他们到附近去吃午饭。

sentences.sContent: "Where do you want to have lunch?, " I asked.
sentences.sContent_eng: "Where do you want to have lunch?, " I asked.
sentences.sCn: 我问她：“你想去哪里吃午饭啊？”

sentences.sContent: I have lunch at a restaurant with my colleagues.
sentences.sContent_eng: I have lunch at a restaurant with my colleagues.
sentences.sCn: 我跟同事一块儿在一家餐馆吃午饭。
